::Battera::

She lowers her head. "There is nothing to be done for the moment. It 
will happen soon.  But we must wait for the moment."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider stands up. He looks into Battera's optics.
> "Well",he says, "now there's one more. No one seems to
> realize just what's at stake in this war. No matter
> who wins this war, everybody loses. We've got to stop
> this war, and I want to help you do it."
>
